Transcription : "Plan du troisième étage"
<span style="caret-color: #333333; color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">This title indicates that the current plan represents the third floor of the Sorbonne.
